text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- On the initiative of President Ben Ali, Tunisia will set up a programme to help the poor during the fasting month of Ramadan. The programme includes food aid for 24,000 families, financial aid, and the opening of 120 free restaurants.
- Foreign investors are allowed to buy up to 49 percent of Tunisian firms' capital without prior authorisation.
- The government approved a new system for civil service wages and promotion.
